title: As soon as I get ingame, League stops working and closes
body: As soon as the game starts, League "stops working" and closes. However, once I reconnect, I am able to play the game. It doeskin matter what mode I play.

replies.body: When you transition from champion select to the game server, your network has to move you over but can fall into a dormant state if it fails.  If this keeps happening, I recommend going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is strong and able to maintain that connection.  That should get you squared away!
